table.name: quest_transcript
table.comment: Student transcripts (one record for each grade). Courses for each grade are stored in TranscriptCourse.

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: Student who submitted this transcript. FK to Contact ID

field.name: school_year
field.comment: Which school year this transcript is for. Expected values are Nine, Ten, Eleven, Twelve and Summer.

field.name: term_system_id
field.title: Term System
field.comment: Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses term_system option group values.

field.name: gp_weighted_total
field.title: Calculated GPA (unweighted)
field.comment: Unweighted Grade Point calculated for all courses in a given grade.

field.name: gp_unweighted_total
field.title: Calculated GPA (weighted)
field.comment: Weighted Grade Point calculated for all courses in a given grade.
